safari-installed-page-title.message: Adblock Plus for Safari was enabled

safari-installed-subtitle.message: Ads are now blocked in Safari.

safari-installed-desc-2.message: Open the app to enable blocking for cookie pop-ups, surveys, and other distractions - all in just a tap.

safari-installed-note.message: Additional features are off by default to keep things simple. You can enable them any time in the app.
